class.name: Bicycle
class.doc: Bicycle implements a standard bicycle. Bicycles are a useful way of transporting oneself, without too much effort (unless you go uphill or against the wind). If there are a lot of people on the road, you can use RingBell to ring your bell (**note**, not all bicycles have bells!).

subclass.name: MountainBike
subclass.brief: Mountain bike implementation of a transport::Bicycle.

method.name: RingBell
method.doc: RingBell rings the bell on the bike. Note that not all bikes have bells.
